FuncDef: The display port split command displays the splitting status of an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters and cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the type of an interface.
The value can be:
100GE25GE50|100GE

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters and cannot contain spaces.

Examples: (Interface Group): All the interfaces in the group have configuration restrictions. For example, all these interfaces must have the same LAN or WAN mode.
Port             Split Ability        Default Mode         Current Mode         Current Interface
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the splitting status of an interface, run the display port split command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
